description:
First, Onsokumaru gets sent to Hell! But, Hell can`t be all that bad...! There are demon schoolgirls, demon wives, demon in-laws... Well, the demon in-laws could be kinda bad...  Then, it`s too hot to train, so the ninjas have little to do but sit around
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Onsokumaru Vai Ao Inferno! / II. Ninja, Aproveite O Festival De Verão!
Onsokumaru Goes to Hell / The Ninjas Host a Summer Festival
Onsokumaru va en enfer / Le festival d`été des ninjas
Onsokumaru, Jigoku ni Ochiru no Maki / Ninja, Natsumatsuri o Okonau no Maki
音速丸, 地獄に落ちるの巻 / 忍者, 夏祭りを行うの巻
